title: Japan Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Japan increased to 245.80 percent in 2021 from 240 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Japan averaged 239.06 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 286.10 percent in 1995 and a record low of 215.20 percent in 2015. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
